title: ''You've been disconnected from chat, tryng to re-connect''  It's been trying to connect for days..

embed.description: If you have completed your Blue Essence conversion missions, check that you have redeemed the mission rewards. You can do this by going to the Loot section in your client (you can find this at the top of the client) Find any unopened Loot Capsules that you earned by completing the related Blue Essence conversion missions.

body:
Almost one week passed since my account has been trying to reconnect to Chat in the Client. I can't see anybody online, talk to them, and they can't see me online . Now, i can play games and everything works fine, except i can't reconnect to the client chat. I tried everything, deleteing the game, resintalling it. Logging into my account from another PC, still not connected to the Client chat server.... 
It all started when my internet crashed during a match, and since then, i've been reconnecting to the chat.
**P.S. It's not an anti-virus, or a firewall problem. **

replies.body:
It might be worth it to double check for anti-virus or firewall issues if you haven't yet just as a troubleshooting step, it'd be silly to suffer through this for so long only for it to be a simple fix.

If that's not helping, try updating your port forwarding settings to make sure the client is able to make that connection to the chat servers (it needs it's own connection separate from the client's connection). If you aren't sure how to make those changes, check out the steps in [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq8).
